title: Is everything Pre-ordained, even black magic, evil eye, jinn possession etc? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: is everything pre-ordained such as evie line magic and gin possession the answer is yes every single thing that happens in the whole universe has been already preordained and written down in details 50 000 years before allah created the whole universe so it's written and overdone with because preordainment is allah's knowledge so this knowledge was written down telling us what is going to happen and it was done way way back and no one knows about it except allah the almighty azzawajal
